title: i recived honor level 3, but didn't get the capsule.

replies.body: I didnt receive a capsule when I reached honor level 3, what do I have to do get the capsule?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148

They are random drops just like key fragments.
i also got a message saying that i got a capsule  once getting to honor 5 but i didnt get it
im honor lvl 4 and still havent got a single capsule......... ty rito
Iff they drop like key fragments, does it mean everyone gets them or just some?
nah mate i got it and im level 2
you cant get honor capsule at lvl 2 riot said it in their honor video
Indeed, capsules will drop randomly and act as an additional perk to normal fragment drops!  Grats on reaching 3!

really guys i`m play daily none capsule get this month only 2 key fragment 9 days of daily play 5 - 7 hours and get nothing and always support replay wait a little more let capsule some more time and u get it now 9 days and only get 2 fragment is this fair ...or now the rule pay to play ?..........-_-{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

i got Honor 3 but i didnot get the capsul why 

 ty {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
i've been lvl 3 for 3 days now and my bro for 2, i didn't get a capsule but he did i keep getting normal keys sometimes 1 sometimes 2 what should i do ?
Do i need to have champion im playing with to get capsule after that game or they just drop randomly to any champion i play, bought or not?
I think I had a message for a capsule when I got lvl 3 honor, but so far nothing in my Loot.
